item.title: PRG launch his new website
item.description: We are launching a new website with updated information about our radiogrouppe. PRG is a club for all DTU students interested in HAM radio communication and electronics. The club is located at DTU building 101 E, 1 floor, room 116C. We have a club day every Wednesday at 17:30, where you can meet a board member who can help you sign into the club. The price for membership pr semester is 60kr.
